Articles.Content: Is it possible for someone (who has a beast of a setup) to record the IVA from inside a cockpit as a 360 video? Or from a perspective of a camera on the side of the rocket? I was thinking cool ways to add to KSP in VR and those would be awesome for a Youtube 360 video. Especially since I want to watch the action in 360, not participate. Otherwise I'd save a lot for a Oculus Rift, but would this be possible for a YouTube 360 video?
